ComicInfo.Summary: While the Police Department searches for the missing Dragon, remaining members of the Vicious Circle argue over leadership rights. She-Dragon applies for and is refused membership in the Police. To prove herself, she attacks and is defeated by Rapture. Elsewhere, Dragon manages to break free of the smokestack he is trapped in.

ComicInfo.Title: She-Dragon Vs. Rapture
